/* 디비에 쌓여있는 전체 드라마 삭제 쿼리 */
delete from web_app_test2.tb_drama
mapper.select:
/* 전체 드라마 리스트 조회 쿼리 */
select r_drama_no as dramaNo , m_n_no as madeNatureNo , title as dramaTitle , author as dramaAuthor , page_per_drama_cnt as pagePerDramaCnt , use_yn as dramaUseYnEnum , left(replace(drama_reg_dt, '. ', '-') ,length(replace(drama_reg_dt, '. ', '-')) - 1) as dramaRegDt , left(replace(reg_dt, '. ', '-') ,length(replace(reg_dt, '. ', '-')) - 1) as regDt from web_app_test2.tb_drama order by str_to_date(dramaRegDt, '%Y-%m-%d') desc

/* 전체 드라마 리스트 조회 쿼리(pagination) */
select r_drama_no as dramaNo , m_n_no as madeNatureNo , title as dramaTitle , author as dramaAuthor , page_per_drama_cnt as pagePerDramaCnt , use_yn as dramaUseYnEnum , left(replace(drama_reg_dt, '. ', '-') ,length(replace(drama_reg_dt, '. ', '-')) - 1) as dramaRegDt , left(replace(reg_dt, '. ', '-') ,length(replace(reg_dt, '. ', '-')) - 1) as regDt from web_app_test2.tb_drama order by str_to_date(dramaRegDt, '%Y-%m-%d') desc limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}

/* 단일 드라마 리스트 조회 쿼리 */
select r_drama_no as dramaNo , m_n_no as madeNatureNo , title as dramaTitle , author as dramaAuthor , page_per_drama_cnt as pagePerDramaCnt , use_yn as dramaUseYnEnum , left(replace(drama_reg_dt, '. ', '-') ,length(replace(drama_reg_dt, '. ', '-')) - 1) as dramaRegDt , left(replace(reg_dt, '. ', '-') ,length(replace(reg_dt, '. ', '-')) - 1) as regDt from web_app_test2.tb_drama where r_drama_no = #{dramaNo} order by str_to_date(dramaRegDt, '%Y-%m-%d') desc
